key_points.text:
EQT buys Korean AR-driven HR platform for 500 billion won
Positive Sentiment:
EQT, together with CPP Investments, completed a $3 billion take-private acquisition of government HR software provider NEOGOV, expanding its software portfolio into the public sector.
El Segundo-based NEOGOV Acquired by EQ

EQT R&W claim on US telecoms deal being settled at $300mn-$400mn
Negative Sentiment:
Zacks Research lowered its Q3 2025 EPS estimate for EQT to $0.58 (from $0.66), indicating potential headwinds for near-term earnings.

Positive Sentiment:
EQT agreed to acquire South Korea’s AR-driven HR platform “Remember” for approximately 500 billion won, bolstering its presence in the fast-growing Asian HR tech market.

Zacks Research Issues Pessimistic Outlook for EQT Earnings
Posted 56m ago
AI Generated. May Contain Errors.
EQT will settle a representations & warranties claim on a U.S. telecom deal for an estimated $300 million–$400 million, representing a sizable one-time cash outflow.
